front.title: DNS Proxy Bypass by Recursive DNS Discovery and LOCAL.ARPA

abstract.t: This document describes a method for a DNS client resolver todiscover the IP addresses of the upstream recursive DNS resolvers andhence bypass the local DNS proxy. It also directs IANA to reservethe "LOCAL.ARPA" domain name and to create a registry for well knownsub-domains of that domain name, such sub-domains being reserved foruse within any network's administrative boundary.
